p: Phytosterols are biosynthetically derived from cycloartenol and are characterized by the lack of methyl groups at C-4 and C-14 [ 54]. Plants have complex and diversified sterol compositions, which are structural components of biological membranes, and that should be a key element of many cellular processes [ 55]. The steroids ( 155â€“ 162) identified in the genus Cedrela are shown in Table 8.
